price: Sizin yaratılışınız da tekrar diriltilmeniz de ancak tek bir kişininki gibidir. Kuşkusuz Allah, her şeyi işitendir, görendir.
arabic: مَّا خَلۡقُكُمۡ وَلَا بَعۡثُكُمۡ إِلَّا كَنَفۡسٖ وَٰحِدَةٍۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَمِيعُۢ بَصِيرٌ

version.title: Turkish translation - Shaaban Britsh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Shaaban Britsh. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: mā khalqukum walā baʿthukum illā kanafsin wāḥidatin inna al-laha samīʿun baṣīrun
